T02D3640:253a-4: bcom ldan 'das ma bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3640:253a-5: dang por sems can thams cad gdon par 'dod pa'i
T02D3640:253a-6: tshul gyis snying rje bsgoms nas phyi dang nang du
T02D3640:253a-7: bcas pa stong pa nyid du dmigs te /
T02D3640:253a-8: bar snang la aam yig las gri gug de'i yu
T02D3640:253a-9: bar zla ba la aam yig rnam par bsams te
T02D3640:253a-10: / de nas rnal 'byor pas 'khor lo spro ba
T02D3640:253a-11: dang bsdu ba bsgoms nas de thams cad yongs su
T02D3640:253a-12: gyur pa las ro'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D3640:253a-13: la bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma sku mdog na
T02D3640:253a-14: ga mo gri gug dang thod pa dang kha tv'am
T02D3640:253a-15: / ga 'dzin pa / phyag gnyis pa zhal gcig pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D3640:253a-16: dmar zhing zlum pa'i spyan gsum pa /
T02D3640:253a-17: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D3640:253a-18: mgo bo dang mgrin pa dang snying ga rnams su aom a'a:h'um gi yi ge rnams so //
T02D3640:253a-19: snying gar zla ba la gri gug gi yu bar
T02D3640:253a-20: zla ba la aam yig bsams nas sngags bzlas par
T02D3640:253a-21: bya'o // aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri
T02D3640:253a-22: r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam sv'a h'a
T02D3640:253a-23: bya'o // / zhes sngags bzlas par bya'o //
